hevs.gdx2d.components.physics

Class PhysicsStaticBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • hevs.gdx2d.lib.physics.AbstractPhysicsObject
      • hevs.gdx2d.components.physics.PhysicsStaticBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BodyInterface

    public class PhysicsStaticBox
extends AbstractPhysicsObject
    A physical box that does not move, see AbstractPhysicsObject.

    Note: all dimensions and positions are in pixels.

    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry (mui)

      • PhysicsStaticBox

        public PhysicsStaticBox(java.lang.String name,
                Vector2 position,
                float width,
                float height)
        Create a static box.
        Parameters:
        name - An optional name for the object (for debug)
        position - The position of the center point
        width - The width of the physics box
        height - The height of the physics box

      • PhysicsStaticBox

        public PhysicsStaticBox(java.lang.String name,
                Vector2 position,
                float width,
                float height,
                float angle)
        Create a static box.
        Parameters:
        name - An optional name for the object (for debug)
        position - The position of the center point
        width - The width of the physics box
        height - The height of the physics box
        angle - The angle of the box (trig angle)
